EmailTemplate.subject: India’s Surge in Cash Withdrawals Is Coming
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Cash use is predicted to boom in India in the next few years—and it will strain the cash operations for banks across the country. India residents will soon be making 17 billion cash withdrawals every year, with the value of these withdrawals rocketing to INR 83 trillion. That’s a lot of cash moving through your ATMs. And it could cause a cash handling headache for your staff, from increased security risks to never-ending replenishment visits to high cash-in-transit costs. The solution? Cash recycling.
